channel.title: Game Loading Crash - On A Rail
channel.description:
Hello i have same problem like MRNONAME iam in On A Rail Chapter and when i get to the loading screen and then game crash to the desktop i dont know what to do please help me
:frowning: ?(

item.title: Game Loading Crash - On A Rail
item.dc:creator: Mrrnoname
item.description:
As said above I had this issue, after patch 0.0.2 was released the problem went away for me. I didn’t do anything to fix it per-say. If the developers want to investigate this my thread on the issue has my crash dump file attached.

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/Thread/28148-Game-Crash-On-A-Rail/

Mrrnoname

Read full topic
item.source: Game Loading Crash - On A Rail
